templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://www.lifestride.com/shoe-size-chart

templates.name: Price Adjustment
templates.content: We do offer price adjustments within 10 days of the original purchase date.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/lifestrideshoe/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/lifestride/

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact us directly at http://lifestride.custhelp.com/app/ask or give us a call at 800-838-4385. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content:
Orders are shipped very quickly and as such, we're unable to make any edits or cancellation once they begin to process. So sorry about that!

Unworn items can be returned within 30 days of the purchase date for a refund.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 800-838-4385 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly from http://lifestride.custhelp.com/app/ask Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Order status / order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.lifestride.com/track-order?icid=Footer_Help_TrackOrder

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: I'm afraid we currently don't offer free shipping. All orders ship for $7 via Standard Shipping.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days. Once shipped, it will take 5-9 business days for domestic orders. We also offer expedited shipping, if you need it faster.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! I'd recommend taking a look at our size chart on each product page. If you're still unsure, just let me know!

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.lifestride.com/help/returns-and-exchanges?icid=Footer_Help_Returns

templates.name: Can you apply a code retroactively?
templates.content: I'm afraid we can't make any changes after the order has been placed, but you can use the code on the next purchase as it won't expire.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to contact us directly from http://lifestride.custhelp.com/app/ask Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://www.lifestride.com/discount-program?srsltid=AfmBOoqXTrbcMSS6TL5TnExWKkIZWQcD3cIBXAj4gf4dhBtdTP7ak9iA

templates.name: Start a return
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://lifestride.attn.tv/sl/5rPH9xH2

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.lifestride.com/sale?icid=TopNav_Header_Sale_AllSale_2023_FallRefresh

templates.name: Holiday discounts
templates.content: Thanks for reaching out! You are subscribed and will receive updates about the latest offers. You can always check out our site at https://www.lifestride.com/ for additional information!

templates.name: Do you offer student discount?
templates.content: Yes! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://www.lifestride.com/discount-program?srsltid=AfmBOoqXTrbcMSS6TL5TnExWKkIZWQcD3cIBXAj4gf4dhBtdTP7ak9iA
